description.en: Between 30% PHY damage to a random unit
description.ja: ランダムにPHYの100%分ダメージ

description.en: After own active skill, 150% PHY damage to front enemy at a probability of 10%
description.ja: 自分がActive時10%の確率で、先頭の敵にPHYの150％分ダメージ

description.en: After own active skill, 150% INT damage to front enemy at a probability of 10%
description.ja: 自分がActive時10%の確率で、先頭の敵にINTの150％分ダメージ

name.en: A Cunning Hero in Chaotic Times

description.en: After own active skill, 10% PHY increase to own HP
description.ja: 自分がActive時、PHYの10%分自分のHPアップ

description.en: After own active skill, 30% INT increase to all allies's INT and AGI at a probability of 10%
description.ja: 自分がActive時10%の確率で、味方全体のINT / AGIをINTの30％分アップ

description.en: When own HP becomes <60% for the first time, 80% INT damage to all enemy
description.ja: 初めてHP60%未満になった時、敵全員にINTの80%分ダメージ

name.en: A Match for a Thousand Foes

description.en: At time of first death, Resurrect with 30% HP
description.ja: 初死亡時、HP30%で復活

description.en: After own active skill, recovers all allies' HP by 100% at a probability of 10%
description.ja: 自分がActive時10%の確率で、味方全体に100%の回復効果を与える

description.en: 50% for the first time,25% INT increase to all enemies' PHY, INT and AGI
description.ja: 初めてHP50%未満になった時、敵全員のPHY / INT / AGIをINTの25%分ダウン

description.en: After own active skill, 10% INT increase own AGI
description.ja: 自分がActive時、自分のAGIをINTの10%分アップ

description.en: After own active skill,  30% INT increase to all allies's PHY and INT at a probability of 10%
description.ja: 自分がActive時10%の確率で、味方全員のPHY / INTをINTの30%分アップ

description.en: When taking damege, 30% INT damage to front enemy
description.ja: 被ダメージ時、先頭の敵にINTの30%分ダメージ

name.ja: エジソン・エフェクト

description.en: After own active skill, 30% INT increase to all allies's INT at a probability of 15%
description.ja: 自分がActive時15%の確率で、味方全員のINTをINTの30%分アップ

description.en: At time of first death, recovers all allies' HP by 70% and resurrect with 5% HP
description.ja: 初死亡時、味方全員に70%の回復効果を与えたあと、HP5%で復活

description.en: After own active skill,  140% INT damage to front enemy at a probability of 10%
description.ja: 自分がActive時10%の確率で、先頭の敵にINTの140%分ダメージ

description.en: After own active skill,  50% PHY damage to front enemy at a probability of 10%
description.ja: 自分がActive時10%の確率で、先頭の敵にPHYの50%分ダメージ

description.en: At time of battle commencement, 10% INT increase to all allies AGI
description.ja: バトル開始時、味方全員のAGIをINTの10%分アップ

description.en: When own HP becomes <50% for the first time, 120% PHY damage to front enemy
description.ja: HPが50%未満になった時、先頭の敵にPHYの120%分ダメージ

name.ja: クリプトタクティクス

description.en: When own HP becomes <50% for the first time, 120% INT damage to front enemy
description.ja: HPが50%未満になった時、先頭の敵にINTの120%分ダメージ

description.en: When taking damege, recovers all allies by 70% at a probability of 50%
description.ja: 死亡時50%の確率で、味方全員に70%の回復効果を与える

description.en: 40% PHY damage to front enemy
description.ja: 先頭の敵にPHYの40%分ダメージ

description.en: 60-80% PHY damage to front enemy
description.ja: 先頭の敵にPHYの60~80%分ダメージ

description.en: 60-70% INT damage to front enemy
description.ja: 先頭の敵にINTの60~70%分ダメージ

description.en: Recovers ally with lowest Hp by 120%
description.ja: 最もHPが低い味方に120%の回復効果を与える

description.en: 20-40% INT damage to front enemy and Sometimes an front enemy gets confused
description.ja: 先頭の敵にINTの20~40%分ダメージを与え、混乱効果を与えることがある

description.en: 50-60% PHY damage to front enemy
description.ja: 先頭の敵にPHYの50~60%分ダメージ

name.ja: ブレイブプロテクション

description.en: 20% INT increase own PHY
description.ja: 自分のPHYをINTの20%分アップ

description.en: 45-50% INT front enemy
description.ja: 先頭の敵にINTの45~50%分ダメージ

description.en: 20-30% PHY damage to front enemy and 10% INT increase to own PHY
description.ja: 先頭の敵にPHYの20~30%分ダメージを与え、自分のPHYをINTの10%分アップ

description.en: Recovers ally with lowest HP by 70%
description.ja: 最もHPが低い味方に70%の回復効果を与える

description.en: 40-50% PHY damage to front enemy
description.ja: 先頭の敵にPHYの40~50%分ダメージ
